channel.title: Blog on worm

item.title: Creatine Deep Dive
item.description: Hey, meatsuits. I’m of the opinion that most people stand to benefit from supplementing creatine. I’ll try to lay out my argument for why. I’m not the first or the only to make this argument, nor do I have any illusions that I will do it more rigorously, or convincingly. I have just seen benefits from it myself, and wanted to review the evidence and the mechanisms. I think that it stands high, if not at the top, of the list of actually useful supplements - an example of a supplement that does not just result in expensive urine.
